Advanced Features Demo

Testing theme generation, animations, and advanced utilities

1. Dynamic Theme Generation

Generated from source color #6750A4 using Material Color Utilities

Primary

oklch(0.55 0.15 280)

Secondary

oklch(0.75 0.08 280)

Accent

oklch(0.65 0.12 120)

Muted

For subtle backgrounds

Border

Consistent borders

2. Programmatic Animations

Fade In

animate-fade-in

Slide Up (500ms)

animate-slide-up-500ms

Bounce

animate-bounce-ease-in-out

Pulse Infinite

animate-pulse-1s-infinite

Composed

animate-fade-in+slide-up

Spin

animate-spin-2s-linear-infinite

3. Arbitrary Value Syntax

Custom Width Calculation

w-[calc(100%-40px)]

Custom Gradient with OKLCH

bg-[linear-gradient(135deg,oklch(0.55_0.15_280),oklch(0.65_0.12_120))]

4. Auto-Grouping (Jaccard Similarity)

Repeated patterns automatically detected and grouped

Pattern Instance 1

5. Binary Dawn CSS Format

Zero-Copy Binary Format

  • ✓ Magic bytes: DXBD (0x44 0x58 0x42 0x44)
  • ✓ Varint encoding for IDs < 128 (1 byte vs 2)
  • ✓ Checksum validation on load
  • ✓ Binary search lookup O(log n)
  • ✓ Sub-microsecond style lookups

6. OKLCH Color Space

Perceptually uniform colors for better gradients and contrast

Uniform hue rotation: 0° → 90° → 180° → 270° → 360°
